channel.title: Cloud on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Cloud on TLDRBins

item.title: AWS
item.description: Setup # Install awscli sudo apt install awscli # Set config aws configure AWS Access Key ID [None]: test AWS Secret Access Key [None]: test Default region name [None]: test Default output format [None]: Default AWS Credential Location ~/.aws/credentials AWS Services S3 dynamodb lambda # List buckets aws s3 --endpoint-url http://s3.example.com ls # List bucket aws s3 --endpoint-url http://s3.example.com ls s3://<BUCKET_NAME> # Upload to bucket aws s3 --endpoint-url http://s3.example.com cp <FILE> s3://<BUCKET_NAME>/<FILE> # List tables aws --endpoint-url http://s3.
